TopicTitle: KSP keeps crashing after a few minutes

Articles.Content: So my KSP has worked fine before, a few months that is. Now when i want to play it i start building then the game crashes. Here's my KSP.log: https://pastebin.com/nezq0JUR and here's an earlier discussion on steam: https://steamcommunity.com/linkfilter/?url=https://pastebin.com/nezq0JUR

KSP.log doesn’t have anything in it alluding to the cause, try to find Player.log or Player.txt (C:/users/your username/AppData/LocalLow/Squad/Kerbal Space Program/Player.log or Player.txt) and post that as it has much more detailed logs in it.
